column4: does anyone here know a solution for audio going out of sync in videos (audio coming about one second later than the video)
flash 7 for linux was made w/ OSS, not ALSA. As a consequence the audio is out of sync. There is a new flash 9 beta with alsa support... but it doesn't work very well yet.
and kitche, thanks I'll try the new flash. The problem is with all videofiles
